reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that they collect Personal Information to identify users and provide various services.
reply.reference: As described in further detail below, TELUS Health collects, uses and discloses Personal Information to identify you, establish eligibility, and provide technology-enabled total health, wellbeing and human resources services (such as pensions and benefits, employee assistance programs, and health management programs), including through our websites and apps. URL: https://www.telus.com/en/health/about-telus-health/privacy/corporate

TELUS Health Corporate Privacy Commitment
TELUS Health offers a variety of health, wellness and workplace management products and services that are designed to build and maintain healthy communities and workplaces. TELUS Health is committed to delivering remarkable experiences for the benefit of all customers and individuals we serve while also protecting Personal Information and respecting privacy.
TELUS Health commitment to protect your privacy

If your Personal information is transferred outside of your jurisdiction, we will take appropriate measures to ensure an equivalent standard of Personal Information protection under applicable law. We will also obtain consent where this is required under applicable law. Please contact us if you want more information on how we protect Personal Information transferred out of your jurisdiction.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personal health information, personal information, app usage information, website and device information, cookies, lifestyle information, and data related to health outcomes.

reply.analysis: The Privacy Commitment document specifies the various types of data that the app collects, ranging from personal health information to lifestyle information and data related to health outcomes.
reply.reference: Personal Health Information - Any Personal Information regulated under applicable health privacy legislation in the jurisdictions in which we operate...Personal Information - Any information about an identifiable individual, other than business contact information used to contact an individual in their business or professional capacity... App usage information, website and device information, cookies... reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use as mainly to identify the user, establish eligibility, and provide health, wellbeing, and human resources services, analyze and improve services, and communicate with the user.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that TELUS Health collects, uses, and discloses Personal Information to identify users, provide various services, analyze and improve services, and communicate with users, outlining the purpose of data collection and use.
reply.reference: TELUS Health collects, uses and discloses Personal Information to identify you, establish eligibility, and provide technology-enabled total health, wellbeing and human resources services, including through our websites and apps. We also use your information to analyze and improve our services and to communicate with you. URL: https://www.telus.com/en/health/about-telus-health/privacy/corporate

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can withdraw consent to data collection, use, and disclosure, which includes the ability to delete personal information or close their account.
reply.reference: You can close your account associated with the TELUS Health services at any time. To close your account or request to delete your Personal Information, you may be able to make a request through your account or you can contact us as set out below. If your request relates to healthcare or other services received from a third party outside of TELUS Health to whom we have referred you, we will direct you to the appropriate third party who can assist you. URL: https://www.telus.com/en/health/about-telus-health/privacy/corporate

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares aggregated or anonymized information or insights with the TELUS Family and their clients, partners, and third-party service providers for research, planning, risk management, and product development. They ensure that the shared information cannot identify individuals and cannot be associated back to them.

extended_simple_answer.content: Aggregated or anonymized information or insights with the TELUS Family and their clients, partners, and third-party service providers

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app shares aggregated or anonymized information with specific parties for research and development purposes while ensuring the data's privacy.
reply.reference: We may share aggregated or anonymized information or insights with the TELUS Family and our clients, partners and third-party service providers to assist in research, planning, risk management, workforce analytics, or product and service development. When we provide this information, we take appropriate measures to ensure that the data does not identify you and cannot be associated back to you. URL: https://www.telus.com/en/health/about-telus-health/privacy/corporate
